name: US AGAINST ALZHEIMER'S
description: Non-profit organization committed to stopping Alzheimer's disease.

sampleDescriptions: General education about improving research and public health programs to address Alzheimer's.  Concentrating on High-Value Alzheimer's Needs to End Act, H.R. 4957, S. 2387
